      private final int INIT_Y
      Initial position of the ball in the y-axis.

    • INIT_X_DIRECTION

      private final XDirection INIT_X_DIRECTION
      Initial direction of the ball in the y-axis. Its value is XDirection.RIGHT.

    • INIT_Y_DIRECTION

      private final YDirection INIT_Y_DIRECTION
      Initial direction of the ball in the y-axis. Its value is YDirection.UP.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ball

      public Ball(int x, int y, int radius, XDirection xDirection, YDirection yDirection, int speed)
      Constructor with arguments.
      Parameters:
      x - Initial position of the ball in the x-axis.
      y - Initial position of the ball in the y-axis.
      radius - Value for Entity's width and height.
      xDirection - Value for xDirection.
      yDirection - Value for yDirection.
      speed - Value for speed.

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move()
      It updates the ball's x and y along the x-axis and the y-axis according to the orientation in both axes and ball's speed.
      Specified by:
      move in interface Movable

    • getSpeed

      Returns:
      Current value of the attribute speed.

    • setSpeed

      public void setSpeed(int speed)
      Setter of the attribute speed.
      The new value is assigned as long as it is greater than 0. Otherwise, the current value remains.
      Specified by:
      setSpeed in interface Movable
      Parameters:
      speed - New value to assign to the attribute speed.
